unnormalised: Okay, here's my take on return policies in e-commerce:
normalised: Okay, here is my take on return policies in e-commerce:

unnormalised: Yaar, return policies are so important! Remember that kurta I ordered online for Diwali? It was totally the wrong size. Thank God for easy returns. Shops like Flipkart are good, but others...hai rama! Biryani also tastes bad if you can't return it, right? Had to return a defective phone last year near Brigade Road. Rs. 5000 gone otherwise! So, always check that return policy, folks!
normalised: Yaar, return policies are so important! Remember that kurta I ordered online for Diwali? It was totally the wrong size. Thank God for easy returns. Shops like F L I P K A R T are good, but others...hai rama! Biryani also tastes bad if you can't return it, right? Had to return a defective phone last year near Brigade Road. rupee five thousand gone otherwise! So, always check that return policy, folks!
